page.title: 18BIOGRAPHY.
page.content: The most famous family in the Althorp Harlestone and Church Brampton areas, is that of the Right Hon.Earl Spencer of Althorp.His ancestor Sir John first came to Althorp in the late 1400s and it was he who first built on the site. The Spencer estate covers about 8,000 acres including the above villages. Living at Althorp for most of the time, the Earl and Countess take a keen interest in local events and the running of the estate e.g. the Earl is Chairman of Harlestone School governors. Mr.Cooch,a resident of Harlestone,is a member of a family that has lived in the village for centuries.The family firm invented a successful agricultural machine in the 19th.century.Mr.Cooch has amassed a vast amount of historical information about the village.
